JOB DESCRIPTION: Software Engineer   Alchemy seeks motivated and highly skilled software professionals to work with the team on full cycle development projects.     Experience:   2+ years experience as an application developer in a software company; ideally developing customized software applications    Qualifications:   B.E. (Electronics / Computer Science / IT / Systems)  MCA  MSc IT    Primary Responsibilities:   Take ownership of modules in a project  Develop, test, debug the solution  Prepare test cases  Ensure project objectives such as quality standards and completion targets are achieved  Be up-to-date with new technologies and architectures, for potential future implementations    Skills Requirement:   Must have experience with developing software for large scale web based systems  Hands-on experience with ASP.Net, C#.Net MS SQL Server  Experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript    Other Skills:   Excellent interpersonal and communication skills preferred  Good team player, detail oriented, creative  Ability to troubleshoot in Windows Environment
